name: Byting Around
description:
Collect bytes to open the gates to advance to the next level!
A game for the VimJam


I may continue to add stuff in the future! It was kinda rushed as I only had one week

(and also because it's the first game I release!)

THE GAME STILL HAS BUGS, BUT I WILL CONTINUE TO UPDATE IT SO THINGS WILL GET FIXED :)

Known bugs/qol things that needs changing.
-End gate not working

-Postprocessing not deactivating ingame when deactivating it from the menu (you can switch it off in game tho)

-Capsule Collider +current ground detection makes precision jumping impossible
